com.deniz.balanced.business

Interface AuthenticationBusinessService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticationBusinessServiceImpl

    @Transactional
public interface AuthenticationBusinessService
    Authentication related services which serve an interface to be seen from service layer
    Author:
    deniz.yavas

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changePassword(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String passwordCheck, java.lang.String oldPassword)
      Changes password with given one if user exists; old password is right and password and check is same
      void login(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      If user exist and password is correct; do the login process for user
      TODO: Email should be available for login as well
      void signup(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String passwordCheck, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String ancestorRef)
      Sign up user add experience to its ancestors

    • Method Detail

      • login

        void login(java.lang.String username,
         java.lang.String password)
           throws com.deniz.framework.dto.converter.business.impl.valueconverter.exception.DataNotExistException,
                  PasswordWrongException,
                  NotValidIdException
        If user exist and password is correct; do the login process for user
        TODO: Email should be available for login as well
        Parameters:
        username - (not nullable) username which is predefined
        password - (not nullable) encrypted password
        Throws:
        com.deniz.framework.dto.converter.business.impl.valueconverter.exception.DataNotExistException - throws if user does not exist
        PasswordWrongException - throws if password is wrong for given user
        NotValidIdException - throws if a critical fail is detected

      • changePassword

        void changePassword(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.lang.String passwordCheck,
                  java.lang.String oldPassword)
                    throws PasswordWrongException,
                           PasswordNotMatchedException,
                           com.deniz.framework.dto.converter.business.impl.valueconverter.exception.DataNotExistException,
                           PasswordNotSecureException,
                           NotValidIdException
        Changes password with given one if user exists; old password is right and password and check is same
        Parameters:
        username - (not nullable) username which is predefined
        password - (not nullable) encrypted new password
        passwordCheck - (not nullable) check for encrypted new password
        oldPassword - (not nullable) encrypted current password
        Throws:
        PasswordWrongException - throws if password is wrong for given user
        PasswordNotMatchedException - throws if password and check do not match
        com.deniz.framework.dto.converter.business.impl.valueconverter.exception.DataNotExistException - throws if user does not exist
        PasswordNotSecureException - TODO: Add check for if password is secure enough
        NotValidIdException - throws if a critical fail is detected

      • signup

        void signup(java.lang.String username,
          java.lang.String password,
          java.lang.String passwordCheck,
          java.lang.String email,
          java.lang.String ancestorRef)
            throws EmailNotValidException,
                   PasswordNotSecureException,
                   PasswordNotMatchedException,
                   AncestorNotExistsException,
                   DataAlreadyExistException,
                   com.deniz.framework.dto.converter.business.impl.valueconverter.exception.DataNotExistException,
                   NotValidIdException,
                   AncestorInviteLimitReachedException
        Sign up user add experience to its ancestors
        Parameters:
        username - (not nullable) username to use in login process
        password - (not nullable) encrypted password
        passwordCheck - (not nullable) encrypted password to check
        email - (not nullable) email of user
        ancestorRef - (not nullable) reference link for the ancestor of user; only blank for the root user who does not need to signup
        Throws:
        EmailNotValidException - throws if email failed in validation
        PasswordNotSecureException - TODO: Add check for if password is secure enough
        PasswordNotMatchedException - throws if password and check do not match
        AncestorNotExistsException - throws if ancestor does not exist
        DataAlreadyExistsException - throws if same username exists
        com.deniz.framework.dto.converter.business.impl.valueconverter.exception.DataNotExistException - throws if user with name does not exist
        NotValidIdException - throws if a critical fail is detected
        AncestorInviteLimitReachedException - throws if ancestor reached his invitation limit
        DataAlreadyExistException
